    "version": "1.0"
  },
  "description": {
    "short": "Create targeted sensory illusions in one person's mind.",
    "player": "You can make someone perceive something that isn't there. The closer to reality, the easier - a missing door, a different number on a bill. Self-preservation acts as a circuit breaker - convincing someone the roof extends further than it does will likely fail, but making a $20 look like $100 is simple. Non-persistent; they'll be angry when it fades."
  },

The stronger the group identity (military units, cults), the more pronounced the effect. Many find this constant loss of self maddening - always becoming whoever you're with."

    "version": "1.0"
  },
  "description": {
    "short": "Perfect vocal replication carrying emotional resonance.",
    "player": "You can perfectly replicate any voice you've heard by reading the nervous system patterns of vocal production. The mimicry carries the emotional state from when you learned it - a voice learned in terror always trembles, one learned in joy carries warmth. Strategic collection of emotional variants required for versatile impersonation."
  },

{
  "type": "move",
  "id": "siren-sympathetic-resonance",
  "name": "Sympathetic Resonance",
  "lineage": "esper",
  "archetype": "siren",
  "path": "siren.aural.receiver",
  "evolutionStage": 0,
  "moveType": "move",
  "isMentalist": true,
  "category": "Mentalist Powers",
  "tags": ["esper", "mentalist", "siren", "aural", "receiver", "bio-sensing", "crowd-reading"],
  "metadata": {
    "source": "mentalist-powers.txt",
    "version": "1.0"
  },
  "description": {
    "short": "Read the collective biological state and disturbances in crowds.",
    "player": "You sense the aggregate nervous system of crowds - heartbeats, breathing, stress hormones as a biological symphony. Detect when crowds are about to panic, sense ambushes through elevated heart rates, track targets by the ripples they create in the crowd's biology. In high-stress areas, the cacophony can be overwhelming, potentially triggering sympathetic responses in your own body."
  },
  "mentalistPolarity": "receiver",
  "mentalistScope": "aural",
  "grantedBy": "aural_receiver",
  "rollStat": "Intuition",
  "range": "area",
  "duration": "concentration",
  "effects": [],
  "flaws": []
